step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched fully overhead and your fingers are spread wide.
You're making a good fist and pushing down. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together a bit more as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep that relaxed feeling as you prepare for the next repetition.
You're doing well with the arm movement. Focus on maintaining the squeeze of your shoulder blades as you push down.
Great work completing the repetitions! Remember to keep your fingers spread wide when stretching your arms overhead.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms fully overhead with fingers spread wide, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale and relax as you return your arms overhead.
